#Text=Robert
#Text=Blake ( Medal of Honor )
#Text=Robert Blake
#Text=was a Union Navy sailor during the American Civil War and a recipient of America 's highest military decoration , the Medal of Honor .
#Text=Blake was the second African American to perform a Medal of Honor action ; William Harvey Carney was the first .
#Text=Blake was the first African American to actually receive a Medal of Honor - his was presented to him in 1864 , while Carney did not receive his until 1900 .
#Text=But , because Carney 's Medal of Honor action occurred first , Carney , not Blake , is usually credited with being the first African American Medal of Honor recipient .
#Text=Biography
#Text=Robert Blake was born into slavery in Virginia .
#Text=In June 1862 , his owner 's plantation was burned during a Union naval expedition up the Santee River .
#Text=About 400 slaves from the plantation , including Robert Blake , were taken as contraband onto Union ships and sent to North Island in Winyah Bay .
#Text=While on North Island , Robert Blake answered a call for twenty single men to serve on the USS Vermont . [ 1 ] [ 2 ]
#Text=By December 25 , 1863 , Blake had been transferred to the gunboat USS Marblehead and was serving as a steward to Lieutenant Commander Richard Worsam Meade .
#Text=Early that morning , in the Stono River , the Marblehead came under fire from a Confederate howitzer at Legareville on Johns Island .

#Text=As Lieutenant Commander Meade jumped from his bed and ran onto the quarter deck to give the order to return fire , Blake followed behind him , handed him his uniform , and urged him to change out of his night clothes . [ 1 ]
#Text=Blake then went to the ship 's gun deck and was immediately knocked down by an exploding Confederate shell .
#Text=The explosion had killed a powder-boy manning one of the guns .
#Text=Blake had no assigned combat role and could have retreated to relative safety below decks , but he instead chose to take over the powder boy 's duties .
#Text=He stripped to the waist and began running powder boxes to the gun loaders .
#Text=When Lieutenant Commander Mead asked him what he was doing , he replied " Went down to the rocks to hide my face , but the rocks said there is no hiding place here .
